description: Try our easy to follow Herb & Garlic Damper recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Damper,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Herb & Garlic Damper Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place 2 cups of self-raising flour into a bowl. Add butter and rub into flour. Mix in 1 teaspoon of granulated garlic and 1 teaspoon dried mixed herbs.
Pour in 1 cup milk (or 1/2 cup each milk and water) and mix until a dough forms. Knead in the bowl for a few minutes until smooth.

Form the dough into a rough round and cut a cross in the top. Cook in a heavy-based pot placed into the coals of the fire for about 30 minutes until cooked through and damper sounds hollow when tapped.
